Description: Body sherd of Attic, probably black-figured, pottery lip-cup with sharp offset inside, slight one outside: interior glazed black; exterior: reserved with black band below offset lip.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ5 according to Register
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0556) (Phase 1)
